categories-0.3: Category LibraryContentsIndex
Control.Category.Functor
Portabilitynon-portable (class-associated types)
Stabilityexperimental
MaintainerEdward Kmett <ekmett@gmail.com>
Description
Redefines Functor to allow it to represent a functor between different categories
Synopsis
class (Category c, Category d) => Functor f c d | f c -> d, f d -> c where
map :: c a b -> d (f a) (f b)
Documentation
class (Category c, Category d) => Functor f c d | f c -> d, f d -> c where

Must satisfy the functor laws: 

 map id = id
 map (f . g) = map f . map g
Methods
map :: c a b -> d (f a) (f b)
Instances
Functor Identity (->) (->)
Functor f k k => Functor f (Dual k) (Dual k)
Functor f => Functor (NativeF f) (->) (->)
Functor ((,) e) (->) (->)
Functor ((->) e) (->) (->)
Bifunctor f k1 k2 k3 => Functor (f a) k2 k3
Produced by Haddock version 0.8
